name: Yazlaw's Journey to the Moon
description:
Yazlaw is going to the moon. Help him get there. Don't get stuck in a rut.

Controls:

  • Movement - AD/arrow keys
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Exchange blocks/ore - C (at crafting station)
  • Break blocks - Click with mouse! You can only break blocks in a small radius around you. If you can't break a type of block, try increasing your strength.

If you get stuck, you lost; refresh and try again. Sorry.

Note: the sprites will potentially be re-done, so that they are good. Game probably won't be expanded from here; this was an attempt at making a full (albeit incredibly short and simple) game, with proper gameplay and progression.
